Text: Thanks BOZX, great upload, great quality. This film will be worth getting in true 720p and 1080p when available however. Great acting.

Thanks for the share.
Unfortunately, after the middle of the film,

movie is perfect, no audio problems at all... if the sound loses sync its because of your computer. it played fine on mine
Screens not working, got some problem with redirection

A=9 V=9

GOM Player indicates this as a 720p resolution video. Without any detectable video distortion I can see I would say this is a legitimate 720p transcoding.

Also there were no sync issues anywhere in TiMPE's encode. Most likely (and I have experienced this myself) persons who have audio sync issues are dropping frames do to inadequate processor power or a Codec conflict.

Kudos to BOZX for giving credit to your source and for your great efforts to keep these files alive ensuring the freedom of sharing.

P.S.> Screen links will work if you "Copy and Paste" to your address bar. The problem of "redirection" is site related and not the fault of BOZX.
